verses.roman:
matta-siṁha-prāya prabhu karilā gamana
premāveśe yāya kari' nāma-saṅkīrtana

synonyms: matta-siṁha—a mad lion; prāya—almost like; prabhu—Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; karilā—did; gamana—touring; prema-āveśe—in ecstatic love; yāya—goes; kari'-performing; nāma-saṅkīrtana—chanting Kṛṣṇa's name.
translation: Almost like a mad lion, Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu went on His tour filled with ecstatic love and performing saṅkīrtana, chanting Kṛṣṇa's names as follows.
